thread.title: Peru Now World's Largest Producer of Cocaine
thread.title_full: Peru Now World's Largest Producer of Cocaine

title: Peru Now World's Largest Producer of Cocaine
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: Nation - Today 
Peru has become the world's largest producer of cocaine as the South American nation's government does little to impede the flow of the drug...
